content:
The link to the ig publisher in this section from the spec:

Note: If you are blocked by a firewall, or if for any reason _updatePublisher fails to execute, download the current IG Publisher jar file here. When the file has downloaded, move it into the directory /build/input-cache (creating the directory if necessary.)

seems wrong
Thanks for the find, we must not have updated that doc when the publisher moved locations. We will update that in the current build version.
